name: game function options
description:
1. Add Unlimited-Retaliation capabilities to all creatures;
2. Add vortex protection to all heroes (players with a lagging game can enable this option);
3. The maximum recruitment limit of heroes for all computer players is set to 2 (suitable for players with a too long turn time or a lagging game);
4. Increase 500 experience points for all wild monsters on the map daily.
author: like

chinese.name: 游戏功能选项
chinese.description:
1.为所有生物增加无限反击能力；
2.为所有英雄增加漩涡保护（游戏运行较卡顿的玩家可开启此选项）；
3.所有电脑玩家的最大招募英雄上限为2名（适合过天时间太长或游戏卡顿的玩家）；
4.地图上所有野怪每日增加500经验。
